# naturalSize

**Instance Property**

The natural display dimensions of the output’s visual media.

## Declaration

```swift
var naturalSize: CGSize { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreGraphics/CGSizeZero], which indicates the system sets the natural size according to the dimensions of the output track’s format descriptions.

You can’t set this value after writing starts.

## Configuring presentation

- **transform**: The transform to use for display of the output’s visual media.
- **preferredVolume**: The volume to prefer for playback of the output’s audio data.
- **mediaTimeScale**: The time scale of the track in the output file.
- **marksOutputTrackAsEnabled**: A Boolean value that indicates whether to enable a track in the output for playback and processing.
